name: Breakout Lab
description:
Team Members

Ferran Barnés - Artist

Rafel Brau - Artist

Èric Canela - Programmer

Òscar Faura - Programmer

Jacobo Galofre - Designer

Description

Take control of a young and fearless researcher in her way out of a laboratory full of infected scientists and save them from their dire condition.
Solve puzzles by throwing different quimical components with incredible results and get yourslef out safe

Gameplay controls

WASD - Move

E - Pick potion

R - Restart Level

Left click - Throw potion

Mouse wheel / 1&2 - Change potions

Link to our repository

https://github.com/El-Tostado/CITM-GameJam

Music used

https://patrickdearteaga.com/chiptune-8-bit-retro/

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

Sound effects are from: https://freesound.org/
